com.mindfusion.scheduling

Class DrawEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.EventObject
      • com.mindfusion.scheduling.DrawEvent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public final class DrawEvent
extends java.util.EventObject
    Contains the arguments passed to handlers of the draw event.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • getElement

        public CustomDrawElements getElement()
        Description copied from class: DrawEvent
        Gets the type of the calendar element being drawn.
        Returns:
        One of the CustomDrawElements constants specifying what element to draw.

      • getStyle

        public Style getStyle()
        Description copied from class: DrawEvent
        Gets the style associated with the element being drawn.
        Returns:
        The Style object associated with the element being drawn.

      • getBounds

        public java.awt.Rectangle getBounds()
        Description copied from class: DrawEvent
        Gets the bounding rectangle of the element being drawn.
        Returns:
        A Rectangle object specifying the element's bounds.

      • getText

        public java.lang.String getText()
        Description copied from class: DrawEvent
        Gets the text associated with the element being drawn.
        Returns:
        A string specifying the text associated with a custom drawn element.

      • getGraphics

        public java.awt.Graphics2D getGraphics()
        Description copied from class: DrawEvent
        Gets the Graphics2D instance whose methods can be used to perform custom drawing.
        Returns:
        An instance of the Graphics2D class used to render the calendar elements.

      • getIndex

        public int getIndex()
        Description copied from class: DrawEvent
        Gets the index associated with the element being drawn.

        This property specifies the index of a view column, cell or a scheduled item being custom drawn. If there is not an index associated with the element, the return value is 0.

        Returns:
        An integer value specifying the element's index.

      • getDate

        public DateTime getDate()
        Description copied from class: DrawEvent
        Gets the date and time associated with the element being drawn.

        If there is not any time associated with the element, the return value is MinValue.

        Returns:
        A DateTime object specifying the date related to the element being drawn.

      • getStartTime

        public Duration getStartTime()
        Description copied from class: DrawEvent
        Gets the start time associated with the element being drawn.

        This property is used only with certain events in Timetable view. For events that do not use it, it is set to Zero.

        Returns:
        A Duration object specifying the start time related to the custom drawn element.

      • getEndTime

        public Duration getEndTime()
        Description copied from class: DrawEvent
        Gets the end time associated with the element being drawn.

        This property is used only with certain events in the Timetable view. For events that do not use it, it is set to Zero.

        Returns:
        A Duration object specifying the end time related to the element being drawn.

      • getItem

        public Item getItem()
        Description copied from class: DrawEvent
        Gets the item being custom drawn.

        This property refers to an item when setCustomDraw is set to CustomDrawElements.CalendarItem, CustomDrawElements.TimetableItem or CustomDrawElements.ResourceViewItem.

        Returns:
        A reference to an Item. If no item is associated with the drawn element, returns null.

      • getPointed

        public boolean getPointed()
        Description copied from class: DrawEvent
        Gets a value indicating whether the associated item (if any) is being pointed by the mouse.
        Returns:
        A boolean value specifying whether the item associated with the event is currently being pointed.

      • getResource

        public Resource getResource()
        Description copied from class: DrawEvent
        Gets the resource related to the element being drawn.

        This could be null when no resource is related to the element.

        Returns:
        A reference to a Contact, Location, Task or Resource related to the custom drawn element.

      • getResources

        public Resource[] getResources()
        Description copied from class: DrawEvent
        Gets the resources related to the element being drawn.
        Returns:
        A list with all related resources.

      • getHandled

        public boolean getHandled()
        Description copied from class: DrawEvent
        Gets a value indicating whether the event was handled by the client.
        Returns:
        true to prevent further rendering of this element; false to proceed with the default rendering.

      • setHandled

        public void setHandled(boolean value)
        Description copied from class: DrawEvent
        Sets a value indicating whether the event was handled by the client.
        Parameters:
        value - true to prevent further rendering of this element; false to proceed with the default rendering.

      • getIsShadow

        public boolean getIsShadow()
        Description copied from class: DrawEvent
        Gets a value indicating whether the shadow of an item is being drawn.

        This property is only valid for CalendarListener.itemDrawing(com.mindfusion.scheduling.DrawEvent) events.

        Returns:
        true if currently drawing the shadow of an item; otherwise, false.
